code: export var TheUser=function TheUser(id,users){var user=users.find(function(u){return u.id===id;});return!!user?user.username:false;};export var ThePic=function ThePic(id,users){var pic=users.find(function(u){return u.id===id;});return!!pic?pic.picture:false;};export default{TheUser:TheUser,ThePic:ThePic};
